Title: Spell Checking (C#, VB, HTML5/JavaScript)
Description: This implements WINRT component wrapper over C++ SpellChecker library which can be used for basic spelling checks and providing suggestions in Window Store App
HomeWiki:
Spell Checking (C#, VB, HTML5/JavaScript)


This implements WINRT component wrapper over C++ SpellChecker library which can be used for basic spelling checks and providing suggestions in Window Store App irrespective of Store App Language.

Please visit link below for more details on usage

http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsapps/SpellChecker-C-9cbafc40
